text: Fishes of the World is a standard reference for fish systematics. Now in its fifth edition (2016), the work is a comprehensive overview of the diversity and classification of the 30,000-plus fish species known to science. ==Other websites== * Fishes of the World (4th edition) Homepage * Fishes of the World (5th edition) Homepage (includes updated classification) Category:Biology books Category:Fish Category:1976 books Category:1984 books Category:1994 books Category:2006 books Category:2016 books
title: Fishes of the World
